headline: Tariffs and AI Flirting
summary: Why markets are reacting so strongly to the "reciprocal tariff" announcements.  Then, Motley Fool contributor Rick Munarriz joins Ricky for a conversation about Nintendo's new Switch 2, and how the device could boost earnings for the video game maker.  To catch full episodes of all The Motley Fool's free podcasts, check out our podcast center.

headline: Spotting Winners: Roku (NASDAQ:ROKU) And Consumer Subscription Stocks In Q4
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Roku (NASDAQ:ROKU) and the rest of the consumer subscription stocks fared in Q4.
